com.wx.io.save

Class SaveableConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wx.io.save.SaveableConfig

  • public abstract class SaveableConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps dealing with any kind of saveable file by providing callback methods (see SaveHandler in case of error. This class provides the following elements:
    • Usual save method: save()
    • A silent save method that will try to save, in case of an error, the SaveHandler* will be triggered: trySave()
    • A method to notify a change in the file: notifyChanged()

    This also provides the isSaved() method that indicates its state. Note that this information is not taken in account when save() is called. Actually, save() is equivalent to calling:

    notifiyChanged();
    save0()

    In order to avoid saving an already up-to-date file, the user is free to check the isSaved() method before calling save()

    * Note that if no SaveHandler is set, the class handler will be used. If no class handler is set neither, the trySave() method will have no effect.
